submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        dp = [defaultdict(int) for _ in range(n)]
        dp[0][nums[0]] = 1
        ans = 0
        if nums[0]==k: ans += 1
        for i in range(1, n):
            if nums[i]==k: ans += 1
            dp[i][nums[i]] += 1
            for it in dp[i-1].keys():
                res = nums[i]&it
                add = dp[i-1][it]
                dp[i][res] += add
                if res==k:ans += add
        return ans
